title: Random Letters in Fontlab
content:
Hey I am designing a typeface to mimic handwriting. I know everyone has done this before but I need it for a project. What I am wanting to know is if there is a way in Fontlab that will randomly insert different characters like 3 different a’s throughout the document. Or if you know a typeface that already does this I will take that.
